metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22624 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.3, iOS 15.4 and iPadOS 15.4, tvOS 15.4,Safari 15.4. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead toarbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
